messages.content: Hello! How can I help you today?

KFC, oh KFC, with its crispy chicken so bright

A food so delicious, you'll want to bite

With a side of fries, and a drink so cold

KFC is the best, don't you know what's sold

In every corner of the world, there's a KFC sign

A symbol of good food, and a taste so divine

So if you're hungry, and you need a treat

Head to KFC, it's the best bet.
